name: Shin Matsunaga Design Inc.
biography: Shin Matsunaga was born in Tokyo in 1940. Following graduation from Tokyo University of Fine Arts and Music in 1964, he worked in the advertising division of Shieseido Cosmetics until 1971 when he left to form his own studio, Shin Matsunaga Design Office Inc.  His works range from graphic design for posters and corporate identities to sculptures and monuments.
